</section><section data-mw-section-id="36" id="mwCmo"><h2 id="Notes">Notes</h2>
<style data-mw-deduplicate="TemplateStyles:r1011085734" typeof="mw:Extension/templatestyles mw:Transclusion" about="#mwt1572" data-mw='{"parts":[{"template":{"target":{"wt":"Reflist","href":"./Template:Reflist"},"params":{"group":{"wt":"note"}},"i":0}}]}' id="mwCms">.mw-parser-output .reflist{font-size:90%;margin-bottom:0.5em;list-style-type:decimal}.mw-parser-output .reflist .references{font-size:100%;margin-bottom:0;list-style-type:inherit}.mw-parser-output .reflist-columns-2{column-width:30em}.mw-parser-output .reflist-columns-3{column-width:25em}.mw-parser-output .reflist-columns{margin-top:0.3em}.mw-parser-output .reflist-columns ol{margin-top:0}.mw-parser-output .reflist-columns li{page-break-inside:avoid;break-inside:avoid-column}.mw-parser-output .reflist-upper-alpha{list-style-type:upper-alpha}.mw-parser-output .reflist-upper-roman{list-style-type:upper-roman}.mw-parser-output .reflist-lower-alpha{list-style-type:lower-alpha}.mw-parser-output .reflist-lower-greek{list-style-type:lower-greek}.mw-parser-output .reflist-lower-roman{list-style-type:lower-roman}</style><div class="reflist   " about="#mwt1572" id="mwCmw">
<div class="mw-references-wrap" typeof="mw:Extension/references" about="#mwt1576" data-mw='{"name":"references","attrs":{"group":"note","responsive":"1"},"body":{"html":""}}' id="mwCm0"><ol class="mw-references references" data-mw-group="note" id="mwCm4"><li about="#cite_note-cold-blooded-7" id="cite_note-cold-blooded-7"><a href="./Dinosaur#cite_ref-cold-blooded_7-0" data-mw-group="note" rel="mw:referencedBy" id="mwCm8"><span class="mw-linkback-text" id="mwCnA">↑ </span></a> <span id="mw-reference-text-cite_note-cold-blooded-7" class="mw-reference-text">Dinosaurs (including birds) are members of the <a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./Clade" title="Clade" id="mwCnE">natural group</a> <a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./Reptilia" title="Reptilia" class="mw-redirect" id="mwCnI">Reptilia</a>. Their biology does not precisely correspond to the antiquated <a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./Class_(biology)" title="Class (biology)" id="mwCnM">class</a> Reptilia of <a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./Linnaean_taxonomy" title="Linnaean taxonomy" id="mwCnQ">Linnaean taxonomy</a>, consisting of <a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./Ectotherm" title="Ectotherm" id="mwCnU">cold-blooded</a> <a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./Amniote" title="Amniote" id="mwCnY">amniotes</a> without fur or feathers. As Linnean taxonomy was formulated for modern animals prior to the study of evolution and paleontology, it fails to account for extinct animals with intermediate traits between traditional classes.</span></li></ol></div></div>

</section><section data-mw-section-id="37" id="mwCnc"><h2 id="Bibliography">Bibliography</h2>

rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./ISSN_(identifier)" title="ISSN (identifier)" class="mw-redirect" id="mwDDs">ISSN</a><span typeof="mw:Entity" id="mwDDw"> </span><a rel="mw:ExtLink nofollow" (2001). </div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="width:1%"><a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./Cursorimorphae" title="Cursorimorphae" class="mw-redirect">Cursorimorphae</a></th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-odd" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./Charadriiformes" title="Charadriiformes">Charadriiformes <span style="font-size:85%;">(gulls and relatives)</span></a></li>
<li><a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./Gruiformes" title="Gruiformes">Gruiformes <span style="font-size:85%;">(cranes and relatives)</span></a></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="width:1%"><a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./Phaethontimorphae" title="Phaethontimorphae" class="mw-redirect">Phaethontimorphae</a></th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-even" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./Tropicbird" title="Tropicbird">Phaethontiformes <span style="font-size:85%;">(tropicbirds)</span></a></li>
<li><a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./Eurypygiformes" title="Eurypygiformes">Eurypygiformes <span style="font-size:85%;">(kagu and sunbittern)</span></a></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="width:1%"><a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./Aequornithes" title="Aequornithes">Aequornithes</a></th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-odd" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./Loon" title="Loon">Gaviiformes <span style="font-size:85%;">(loons or divers)</span></a></li>
<li><a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./Penguin" title="Penguin">Sphenisciformes <span style="font-size:85%;">(penguins)</span></a></li>
<li><a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./Procellariiformes" title="Procellariiformes">Procellariiformes <span style="font-size:85%;">(albatrosses and petrels)</span></a></li>
<li><a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./Stork" title="Stork">Ciconiiformes <span style="font-size:85%;">(storks)</span></a></li>
<li><a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./Suliformes" title="Suliformes">Suliformes <span style="font-size:85%;">(cormorants and relatives)</span></a></li>
<li><a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./Pelecaniformes" title="Pelecaniformes">Pelecaniformes <span style="font-size:85%;">(pelicans and relatives)</span></a></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="width:1%"><a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./Australaves" title="Australaves">Australaves</a></th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-even" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./Cariamiformes" title="Cariamiformes">Cariamiformes <span style="font-size:85%;">(seriemas and relatives)</span></a></li>
<li><a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./Falconiformes" title="Falconiformes">Falconiformes <span style="font-size:85%;">(falcons and relatives)</span></a></li>
<li><a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./Parrot" title="Parrot">Psittaciformes <span style="font-size:85%;">(parrots)</span></a></li>
<li><a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./Passerine" title="Passerine">Passeriformes <span style="font-size:85%;">(perching birds)</span></a></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th scope="row" class="navbox-group" style="width:1%"><a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./Afroaves" title="Afroaves">Afroaves</a></th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-odd" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./Cathartiformes" title="Cathartiformes">Cathartiformes <span style="font-size:85%;">(New World vultures and condors)</span></a></li>
<li><a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./Accipitriformes" title="Accipitriformes">Accipitriformes <span style="font-size:85%;">(eagles and hawks)</span></a></li>
<li><a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./Owl" title="Owl">Strigiformes <span style="font-size:85%;">(owls)</span></a></li>
<li><a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./Mousebird" title="Mousebird">Coliiformes <span style="font-size:85%;">(mousebirds)</span></a></li>
<li><a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./Trogon" title="Trogon">Trogoniformes <span style="font-size:85%;">(trogons and quetzals)</span></a></li>
<li><a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./Cuckoo-roller" title="Cuckoo-roller">Leptosomiformes <span style="font-size:85%;">(cuckoo-roller)</span></a></li>
<li><a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./Bucerotiformes" title="Bucerotiformes">Bucerotiformes <span style="font-size:85%;">(hornbills and hoopoes)</span></a></li>
<li><a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./Coraciiformes" title="Coraciiformes">Coraciiformes <span style="font-size:85%;">(kingfishers and rollers)</span></a></li>
<li><a rel="mw:WikiLink" href="./Piciformes" title="Piciformes">Piciformes <span style="font-size:85%;">(woodpeckers and relatives)</span></a></li></ul>
